alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 06 at 9:43PM EST until March 11 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River from Seymour through Williams. .Minor flooding is ongoing along the East Fork White river and several tributaries due to 1.5 to 3 inches of rainfall that fell Friday March 3rd. Flooding along the East Fork White River is expected from Seymour to Williams, with the crest through Seymour. Flooding along many smaller tributaries that has not already ended will end by Tuesday. Flooding will continue through the end of the week on the lower portion of the East Fork White River river. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON TO LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River at Williams. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon to late Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.6 feet, Water is on State Road 450 at the railroad trestle just east of Williams. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM EST Monday the stage was 6.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday afternoon to a crest of 8.6 feet early Thursday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
